courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
courses.description: This program produces graduates with strong foundations in computer science, including algorithms, data structures, software design, and computational theory.

course_units.title: Introduction to Computer Science
course_units.description: Fundamentals of computer systems, algorithms, and programming logic.

course_units.title: Programming Fundamentals
course_units.description: Introduction to structured programming using high-level languages.

course_units.title: Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science
course_units.description: Mathematical foundations for computer science including logic, sets, relations, and functions.

course_units.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
course_units.description: Implementation and analysis of fundamental data structures and algorithms.

course_units.title: Object-Oriented Programming
course_units.description: Principles and practice of object-oriented design and programming.

course_units.title: Computer Organization and Architecture
course_units.description: Introduction to computer hardware, memory systems, and low-level operations.

course_units.title: Database Systems
course_units.description: Concepts, design, and implementation of database management systems.

course_units.title: Operating Systems
course_units.description: Principles of operating systems design and implementation.

course_units.title: Software Engineering
course_units.description: Software development processes, requirements, design, and testing methodologies.

course_units.title: Computer Networks
course_units.description: Fundamentals of computer network architectures, protocols, and applications.

course_units.title: Web Programming
course_units.description: Technologies and practices for developing web applications.

course_units.title: Theory of Computation
course_units.description: Formal languages, automata theory, and computational complexity.

course_units.title: Artificial Intelligence
course_units.description: Principles and applications of artificial intelligence.

course_units.title: Computer Graphics
course_units.description: Principles and practice of interactive computer graphics.

course_units.title: Research Methods
course_units.description: Research methodologies and academic writing in computer science.

course_units.title: Final Year Project
course_units.description: Capstone project demonstrating comprehensive computer science skills.

course_units.title: Machine Learning
course_units.description: Theory and application of machine learning algorithms.

course_units.title: Information Security
course_units.description: Principles and practices of information security and cryptography.

courses.name: Master of Science in Computer Science
courses.description: Advanced study in theoretical and applied computer science for specialized research and professional development.

course_units.title: Advanced Algorithms
course_units.description: Advanced algorithm design, analysis, and optimization techniques.

course_units.title: Advanced Database Systems
course_units.description: Advanced concepts in database management and distributed systems.

course_units.title: Research Methods in Computing
course_units.description: Advanced research methodologies and statistical analysis for computer science.
